name: Root Seed
description:
! IMPORTANT ! - Enemies are not moving, it's a bug when we export the game, we are working on it, please wait a bit until we fix it.

You are "Seed", a small... seed. Go through the floors of the giant tree by killing the slimes or by sparing them. How you play affects the next levels and your power. Collect power-ups, kill enemies, explore floors, and more! Will you become good or bad?

This game was made during the 2023 Global Game Jam event. It's not finished yet and we will upgrade it in the futur.

Thank you for playing, Feel free to leave a comment to help us improve!
